review_data.title: Make sure you ask for kids portions!
review_data.content: Went here for lunch with my family. Food was good and not too expensive for Zurich. Similar to Santa Lucia they advertise under 12's portions for 9 chf but be sure to specify this to the waiter when you order otherwise they will charge full...More

review_data.title: Good value
review_data.content: This restaurant situated in the 'old quarter' is one of the least expensive in the area, and hence is always fully booked. The food and service are average. You will probably finf yourself sharing a table with other people.

review_data.title: dirty kitchen
review_data.content: I saw the kitchen because I stayed at backpackers. 18 ch for pasta not worth it

review_data.title: lot of choices for pasta
review_data.content: Restaurant that is part of the Bindella, with six restaurants of the same type in Switzerland, one in Geneva. The concept is as its name suggests spaghetti, but the customer has a choice with "feathers" or gnocchi for those who do not want spaghetti. Choice...More

review_data.title: Nice and cosy but nothing special
